Text: Michael H. Weber:  They also wrote the screenplays for "The Spectacular Now" (2013), based on the novel by Tim Tharp; "The Fault in Our Stars" (2014), based on the best-selling novel by John Green; and "Paper Towns" (2015), based on another novel by Green.
